item.description:
The friendliest after work mixer in the city returns with a twist. To help facilitate connections and just have an all-around fun time, we will have a special team trivia edition. And you can't have trivia without prizes. Prizes will be awarded for the highest scoring team. Questions will be Boston related with an emphasis on Black culture. Back Bay Social Club has offered us complimentary apps so come on out.

***YOU MUST ARRIVE BY 7PM TO PARTICIPATE IN THE TRIVIA***

If you own or know someone who owns a retail or customer service business and looking for promotion/advertising, contact for raffle or vendor opportunities.
item.name: Cocktails & Connections: TRIVIA!
